title: Get only new RSS with photo
description:
**At the end, add the service you need, for example [Telegram](Telegram)**

++You can only see the result when you run workflow.++

![workflow-screenshot](fileId:560)

*Based on these answers:
[Latest RSS Feed -> Rocket.Chat](https://community.n8n.io/t/latest-rss-feed-rocket-chat/3770) for get only new post
[Rss to Twitter with Image](https://community.n8n.io/t/rss-to-twitter-with-image/4282) for get image*
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
